references.reason: This paper is foundational to diffusion models, introducing the core concept of denoising diffusion probabilistic models which are the basis of the proposed approach.

references.paper_title: Score-based generative modeling through stochastic differential equations
references.reason: This paper significantly advanced diffusion models by providing a more efficient and effective way to train these models using stochastic differential equations.

references.paper_title: High-resolution image synthesis with latent diffusion models
references.reason: This paper demonstrates the state-of-the-art in high-resolution image synthesis using latent diffusion models, providing a key benchmark for the proposed method.

references.paper_title: Diffusion models beat gans on image synthesis
references.reason: This paper established the superiority of diffusion models over GANs for image synthesis, highlighting the potential of diffusion models as a powerful generative model.

references.paper_title: Knowledge distillation in iterative generative models for improved sampling speed
references.reason: This paper introduced a technique for improving the efficiency of sampling in iterative generative models by using knowledge distillation, a crucial technique for the proposed approach.
